rationale: Due to bug in Polkadot, Acala's parachain 3336 can never produce valid block and therefore unable to perform lease swap action.
details: We try to help Acala team to perform lease swap action between 2000 (Acala) and 3336 (parachain bid by Acala Foundation).

proposal: #115 - Three New HRMP Channels batch On Polkadot
rationale: This referendum aims to accept and open return channels between Statemint and parachains BitGreen, SubSocial and Manta Network.
details: We support this referendum, because opening HRMP channels with Statemint allows those parachains the access to various native Polkadot assets.

rationale: This propoasl asks for funding ofcompleted work on implementing privacy sidechains for any substrate based chain.
details: While privacy is super important especially in the on-chain space, we fully support the work of Integritee.

rationale: This propoasl asks for retroactive funding for the development of the Encointer, a common good parachain on Kusama.
details: Encointer has amazing and inovative usecase, bringing adoption to the local communitites and we fully support that approach, so that's why we voted AYE on this referenda.

rationale: XCM Transactor pallet had an issue in which it crafted an XCM V3 message that could not be converted to XCM V2.
details: Our intention is to help Moonbeam to entact the referendum 95, so why voted AYE to this fast-tracking proposal by Tech-Committee and the Council.

rationale: Accepting HRMP channel open request from Moonbeam is the final step to have GLMR in the Omnipool.
details: Opening channels and allowing trading blue chip tokens like GLMR is amazing achievement for HydraDX Omnipool, so that's we voted AYE.

proposal: #32 - CP45 (RU): Runtime Upgrade 1018 + Add CFG and DOT to Asset Registry
rationale: This referendum will initiate Runtime Upgrade 1018 on Centrifuge and add CFG and DOT to the Asset Registry.
details: By voting AYE, we indicated the approval of expanding investment options for users on Tinlake.
